channel.title: 317 ::item help
channel.description: can someone help me i want to make pickup for individual player so it goes in there player save file like pickup = 0 and you change 0 to 1 so they can use ::item i havent a clue where to start

item.title: 317 ::item help
item.dc:creator: @Dan0194 Dan0194
item.description:
@Dan0194 wrote:

If you want pickup to be for an individual person I. Your pick up command at the beggining add.

If(!player.getName().equalsIgnoreCase("YOUR NAME")) { player.sendMessage("You are not able to spawn items."); return; }

Read full topic
